titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4282 Beach Street in Akron, Ohio, as the "Akron Veterans Memorial Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 4/1/2009--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4282 Beach Street in Akron, Ohio, as the "Akron Veterans Memorial Post Office."
